name: Centro Salutares
description: Landing page built for a local space focused on health-oriented practices such as Pilates, yoga, massages, therapy and much more.

name: Biowell
description: Landing page & e-commerce built for a medicine tech company

name: GPTree
description: Split your Chat GPT contexts in node tree contexts instead of new chats.

name: Neosaland
description: Developed a guessing game's control panel for Neosaldina (a big medicine company in brazil). It was used at the CCXP event as a marketing activation at the company's booth where a host controlled the games and visitors played.

name: Event Companion
description: My college graduation final project. An app, for big events like Lolapalooza, focused on helping customers to find friends and places and also helping companies to have more control over their marketing activations.

name: MSWebmaker
description: Designed the UI & developed a website for a digital marketing company I joined some time later.

name: Tech Run
description: Web game developed for an event at my college. At the event there were some totems with tablets for people to play.

name: Pirate Curse
description: The first web project I did in college. An infinite runner type game where you need to survive as long as you can.
